title: Eddie Van Halen Helps Keep Music In Schools | SHROOM | 100.1 WKQQ
text:
Eddie Van Halen Helps Keep Music In Schools posted by Shroom - share 
Eddie Van Halen knows how important it is to keep music education in our schools. Several years ago he donated 75 of his personal guitars to public school kids through the Mr. Hollands Opus Foundation. So far the organization has donated more than $20 million in music instruments! 
"It's the gift that keeps on giving," the charity's president and CEO Felice Mancini told CNN . "The kids share the guitars, they learn, they graduate and then the instruments stay in the school." 
Click here to watch Eddie Van Halen's interview on CNN . {"position1":{"name":"Van Halen","id":58813,"url":"https:\/\/www.iheart.com\/artist\/van-halen-58813","type":"artist","errors":null,"tagged":true}}
